kylianHesselinkBio:
Hi I am Kylian and I am the president of RotexğŸ”¨. In 2016-2017 I went on an exchange to MexicoğŸ‡²ğŸ‡½, which is obviously the coolest country on the planet. Because who doesn't want to be able to celebrate Christmas on a sunny beach with a coconutğŸ§‰ in hand? The RYE has been the fattest experience of my life where I not only did a lot of fun things but also developed myself. I will also always carry a piece of Mexico with me.

I just finished my bachelor in Sustainable Innovation and am working for half a year before I start my master. Besides that, I spend my days missing RotexğŸ’”, the nicest people walking around in the Netherlands ğŸ˜Œ

victorStormBio:
Ik ben Victor, en ik ben hoofd van commissie extern.

Wij regelen de social media accounts en houden ons bezig met de media-taken van Rotex.

Ik ben zelf in het jaar 2017-2018 naar Taiwan geweest. Ik zat in het dorpje Huwei in de provincie Yunlin.

Tijdens mijn exchange heb ik veel van Taiwan kunnen zien, en heb ik door het exchange programma vrienden van over de hele wereld gemaakt.

Onderhand studeer ik Psychologie in Amsterdam, en hoop ik dat we als Rotex zo snel mogelijk weer nieuwe exchange studenten het jaar van hun leven kunnen geven!

nikkiMureauBio:
I am Nikki, head of the inbound committee of Rotex!

In 2017-2018 I did my exchange in the most beautiful place of the world: Colombia! I lived on the tiny island called San Andres, located in the Caribbean sea. It's an absolutely beautiful place, where I got to enjoy the nice weather, beaches, warm-heartedness of the people, and the bright and lively culture. I also got to explore the mainland of Colombia, and saw a lot of different big cities, small villages and the gorgeous nature like the Amazon and Valle de Cocora.

Not a day passes by where I don't think of Colombia, and I continue to talk to my hostfamily. I can notice Colombia really became a part of me, and will always be for the rest of my life.

Currently I am studying Industrial Design at the Technical University of Eindhoven. I really love that I am still involved in the RYE program through Rotex. Especially in the Inbound committee I stay in contact with exchange students in the Netherlands. The weekends we organize with Rotex for the inbounders are super fun, and I am happy that I get to show the Netherlands to the students, while I also continue to learn from their nationalities!

This coming year I get to be the next chairman of Rotex. I am super excited to set up the RYE program again for next year and help students realize the most amazing year of their lives!

For any questions, comments, suggestions, or collaborations I am happy to contact with you through LinkedIn, or you can call me
fynnBootsBio:
Hee ik ben Fynn en ben lid van de commissie inbound bij rotex. In 2018/2019 ben ik op exchange geweest naar ArgentiniÃ« in een klein dorpje genaamd ArmstrongğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡·. Mijn exchange heeft me veel meer gebracht dan dat ik van tevoren had gedacht. Naast het leven in een totaal verschillende wereld, heb ik nieuwe vrienden voor het leven gemaakt (vooral met de andere exchange studenten), een nieuwe taal geleerd en ontzettend mooie reizen gemaakt. Een exchange gaat niet alleen maar over rozengeurğŸŒ¹en manen schijnğŸŒœmaar juist van die moeilijkere momenten heb ik heel veel geleerd.

Op dit moment studeer ik hospitality management in Amsterdam. In ArgentiniÃ« besefte ik me dat werken in de hospitality echt mijn droom is en die ga ik nu achterna!

Ik gun iedereen zoâ€™n kans! Stuur me gerust een berichtje als je meer wil wetenğŸ˜
daniekKoningBio: Hii! Im Daniek, 19 years old and Iâ€™m currently studying age friendly design and innovation at Windesheim in Zwolle. In 2018/2019 I went on exchange to Canada ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦. I lived in a really small town called High River. Here I had a beautiful view of the Rocky Mountains!ğŸ” Going on exchange was one of the best experiences of my life. I met so many great people, I saw some awesome places and learned a lot! I am currently on the inbound committee where we organize fun activities for exchange students who are coming to the Netherlands.
kevinKooistraBio: Hallo allemaal, ik ben Kevin en ben 18 jaar. Ik studeer op dit moment International Business in Leeuwarden. Ik ben in het jaar 2019-2020 naar Juneau in Alaska geweest. Ik heb in dat jaar speciale, prachtige en leerzame ervaringen gehad en meegemaakt die mij altijd dierbaar blijven! Ik zou het iedereen aanraden om op Exchange te gaan, je zult er absoluut geen spijt van krijgen!
timoHomburgBio: My name is Timo Homburg and I am a proud member of Rotex since 2018. In 2017/2018 I participated in Rotary Youth exchange programme and lived a year in Curitiba, Brazil. With Rotex I try to support and inspire future exchange students in any way possible. My goal is make sure that exchange students can enjoy their year of adventure to their full potential.
